Description.Text: This luxury hotel, which was fully renovated in 2007, offers gorgeous guest amenities overlooking the sea at Sestri Levante. Wireless Internet access, a restaurant with sea view, an American-style bar, conference facilities and a relaxation area are just some of the exclusive hotel amenities that guests can take advantage of. Guests are welcomed in the air-conditioned hotel's lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe, cloakroom, currency exchange and newspaper stand. It also offers a hairdressing salon, auditorium and TV lounge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the cafÃ© and pub. Entertainment also comes in the form of the disco. Guests can enjoy the convenience of room and laundry services. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park or garage. A bicycle hire service is available for those who wish to explore the local area on two wheels (subject to an additional fee).
